title: Pouch, 1900–72
medium:
Medium: plant fiber, cotton, metallic threads
Technique: oblique interlacing (plaiting)
description: Pouch with closely worked patterning featuring three dark brown and ivory geometric patterned bands including several motifs resembling a plant form. A repeated open-worked motif and two narrow bands. Open-worked areas backed by red cotton and stripes of gold foil. Interlining of diagonally interlaced plain weave fiber.

tombstone.epitaph:
Pouch, 1900–72. Medium: plant fiber, cotton, metallic threads
Technique: oblique interlacing (plaiting). 1972-6-8.
